footer.description: Kaarplus is Estonia's largest and most reliable car buying and selling platform. We help you find your dream car safely and quickly.

newsletter.title: Join our newsletter
newsletter.description: Get the best offers and car world news directly to your inbox.
newsletter.consent: By joining, you agree to our privacy terms.
newsletter.toastDescription: You have been added to our newsletter list.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to newsletter
newsletter.description: Be the first to know about new offers and automotive news.
newsletter.successTitle: Thank you! You have successfully subscribed.
